roles.name: component:@sanity/base/document
roles.description: The document component wrapping the root component. Statically built for production, Rendered dynamically on the server in development.

roles.name: component:@sanity/base/root
roles.description: The root component in the DOM-tree. Usually a layout.

roles.name: component:@sanity/base/absolutes
roles.description: Statically positioned elements that should live on the page regardless of routing.

roles.name: tool:@sanity/base/tool
roles.description: Tools available for use within a Sanity configuration

roles.name: machine:@sanity/base/language-resolver
roles.description: Figures out which locale the client should use

roles.name: machine:@sanity/base/locale-message-fetcher
roles.description: Fetches locale messages for the given locale

roles.name: component:@sanity/base/locale
roles.description: Wraps react-intl components, flavoured with the resolved locale
